examples.example: 今天的天气十分晴朗，让人心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: Today's weather is very sunny, making people feel extremely comfortable.

examples.example: 她的演讲十分精彩，赢得了阵阵掌声。

translate.english: Her speech was extremely wonderful and won bursts of applause.

examples.example: 这次考试我准备得十分充分，相信一定能取得好成绩。

translate.english: I have prepared very well for this exam and believe I will surely achieve good results.
